ancest

Class AncestorTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • ancest.AncestorTree

  • public class AncestorTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which allows to build a family tree.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AncestorTree.Person 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AncestorTree(java.lang.String name)
      Builds a new AncestorTree for a person with the given name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AncestorTree.Person get(java.lang.String name)
      Searches for a person with the given name in this tree, and returns it if found.
      java.lang.String getGrandMothersName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the maternal grandmother's name of the person in this tree with the given name.
      int height()
      Calculates the maximum height of this family tree, it is the same as the max grade of consanguinity found.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Tests the Class.
      void print()
      Prints this tree recursively with format (person(mother)(father)).
      int size()
      Counts the number of people in this tree.

        Builds a new AncestorTree for a person with the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public AncestorTree.Person get(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for a person with the given name in this tree, and returns it if found.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the person searched.
        Returns:
        null if not found, else the person in this tree with the given name.

      • height

        public int height()
        Calculates the maximum height of this family tree, it is the same as the max grade of consanguinity found.
        Returns:
        The max height of this family tree.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints this tree recursively with format (person(mother)(father)).

      • size

        public int size()
        Counts the number of people in this tree.
        Returns:
        The number of people in the family.

      • getGrandMothersName

        public java.lang.String getGrandMothersName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the maternal grandmother's name of the person in this tree with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the person we want to know it's grandmother's name.
        Returns:
        Grandmother's name of the person with the given name in this tree. Null if not found the person | the mother | the grandmother.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Tests the Class.

        args - Nothing.
